name: Squad Battles: Vietnam
summary: HPS Simulations is proud to announce the release of Squad Battles: Vietnam; which contains more than 70 scenarios, covering nearly 30 major conflicts of the Vietnam War, involving the US Army and Marine Corps from 1965 through 1971.
info:
• 开发: HPS Simulations
  • 游戏类型: Strategy
